scripts.doc:dependency-diagram: cargo run -p hash-repo-chores -- dependency-diagram --output docs/dependency-diagram.mmd --root hql-diagnostics --root-deps-and-dependents --link-mode non-roots --include-dev-deps --include-build-deps --logging-console-level info
scripts.test:unit: cargo hack nextest run --feature-powerset --all-targets && cargo test --all-features --doc
